elements.name: The updated_Id information in the response body returned from the /api/holidayUpdate/{id} endpoint should be
elements.description: verified to be the same as the id path parameter specified in the /api/holidayUpdate/{id} endpoint.

steps.name: The api user constructs the base url with the "admin" token.
The api user sets "api/holidayUpdate/43" path parameters
The api user prepares a PATCH request containing the updated holiday data to send to the api holidayUpdate endpoint.
The api user sends the PATCH request and saves the response returned from the api holidayUpdate endpoint.
The api user verifies that the updated id information in the response body matches the id path parameter specified in the endpoint.

name: As an administrator, I want to be able to update holiday information for the specified id number via API connection.
